candidates.why: Exact command oracle specified by the requirement doc; same group and behavior (4-phase orchestrator producing a compliance report).
Similar verification/reporting shape (read-only analysis + quality gate recommendation) and same .workflow session conventions.
Same TDD family; defines related command chain and shared session/task artifact structure used by tdd-verify.
Same session discovery and orchestrator conventions; commonly precedes tdd-verify in the workflow chain.
Direct sub-command dependency invoked by tdd-verify Phase 3; defines the intermediate artifacts consumed by the compliance report.

selected.why: Selected because it is the explicit oracle reference for CMD-055 and provides the authoritative headings/sections to align the outline and evidence pointers.
